languages.text: "Ко многим приходит Он в час служения в образах крови и шепотах тени. Но то лишь видения — помни. Ибо смерть истинная придет за тобой лишь в час назначенный. И в костлявые длани душу бережно примет".

"To many, He comes during their time of service, in images of blood and whispers from the shadows. But remember that those are mere visions. For true death will not come for you until your time, and it will take your soul gently in its bony hands."
languages.original_text: "Ко многим приходит Он в час служения в образах крови и шепотах тени. Но то лишь видения — помни. Ибо смерть истинная придет за тобой лишь в час назначенный. И в костлявые длани душу бережно примет".

traits.locale_text: "To many, He comes during their time of service, in images of blood and whispers from the shadows. But remember, those are mere visions. For true death will not come for you until your time is due. And it will take your soul gently in its bony hands."

"To many, He comes during their time of service, in images of blood and whispers from the shadows. But remember, those are mere visions. For true death will not come for you until your time is due. And it will take your soul gently in its bony hands."

"To many, He comes during their time of service, in images of blood and whispers from the shadows. But remember that those are mere visions. For true death will not come for you until your time, and it will take your soul gently in its bony hands."

languages.text: "Vielen erscheint er während ihres Dienstes, in blutigen Bildern und Geflüster aus den Schatten. Denkt aber daran, dass das bloße Visionen sind. Denn der wahre Tod kommt erst, wenn Eure Zeit gekommen ist, und er nimmt Eure Seele sanft in seine knöchernen Hände."
languages.original_text: "To many, He comes during their time of service, in images of blood and whispers from the shadows. But remember that those are mere visions. For true death will not come for you until your time, and it will take your soul gently in its bony hands."

traits.locale_text: "Vielen erscheint er während ihres Dienstes, in blutigen Bildern und Geflüster aus den Schatten. Denkt aber daran, dass das bloße Visionen sind. Denn der wahre Tod kommt erst, wenn Eure Zeit gekommen ist, und er nimmt Eure Seele sanft in seine knöchernen Hände."

languages.text: «Para muchos, acude en acto de servicio mediante imágenes de sangre y susurros desde las sombras. Pero son meras visiones. La verdadera muerte no llegará hasta que sea su hora, momento en que acogerá su alma amablemente con manos de hueso».
languages.original_text: "To many, He comes during their time of service, in images of blood and whispers from the shadows. But remember that those are mere visions. For true death will not come for you until your time, and it will take your soul gently in its bony hands."

traits.locale_text: «Para muchos, acude en acto de servicio mediante imágenes de sangre y susurros desde las sombras. Pero son meras visiones. La verdadera muerte no llegará hasta que sea su hora, momento en que acogerá su alma amablemente con manos de hueso».

languages.text: 「多くの者にとって、主は奉仕するべき時に訪れる。血のイメージや影からの囁き声として。だがおsれは単なる幻影にすぎないことを忘れてはいけない。真の死は、その時が来るまでやってくることはなく、またその骨ばった手であなたの魂を優しく奪う」
languages.original_text: "To many, He comes during their time of service, in images of blood and whispers from the shadows. But remember that those are mere visions. For true death will not come for you until your time, and it will take your soul gently in its bony hands."

traits.locale_text: 「多くの者にとって、主は奉仕するべき時に訪れる。血のイメージや影からの囁き声として。だがおsれは単なる幻影にすぎないことを忘れてはいけない。真の死は、その時が来るまでやってくることはなく、またその骨ばった手であなたの魂を優しく奪う」

languages.text: “许多人活着的时候都见过祂的圣像，看到祂自鲜血中而来，在阴影中低语。但请记住，这些都仅仅是幻象而已，因为只有当您的大限将至时，真正的死亡才会找到您，将您的灵魂温柔地握在它白骨森森的手中。”
languages.original_text: "To many, He comes during their time of service, in images of blood and whispers from the shadows. But remember that those are mere visions. For true death will not come for you until your time, and it will take your soul gently in its bony hands."

traits.locale_text: “许多人活着的时候都见过祂的圣像，看到祂自鲜血中而来，在阴影中低语。但请记住，这些都仅仅是幻象而已，因为只有当您的大限将至时，真正的死亡才会找到您，将您的灵魂温柔地握在它白骨森森的手中。”

languages.text: « Pour beaucoup, Il se manifeste au cours de leurs années de service, sous forme d'images de sang et de murmures échappés des ombres. Mais il convient de garder à l'esprit que ce ne sont là que des visions. Car la mort véritable ne viendra pas avant que votre heure ait sonné, et elle accueillera délicatement votre âme entre ses mains osseuses. »
languages.original_text: "To many, He comes during their time of service, in images of blood and whispers from the shadows. But remember that those are mere visions. For true death will not come for you until your time, and it will take your soul gently in its bony hands."

traits.locale_text: « Pour beaucoup, Il se manifeste au cours de leurs années de service, sous forme d'images de sang et de murmures échappés des ombres. Mais il convient de garder à l'esprit que ce ne sont là que des visions. Car la mort véritable ne viendra pas avant que votre heure ait sonné, et elle accueillera délicatement votre âme entre ses mains osseuses. »

languages.text: "O, kan ve gölgelerden yükselen fısıltıları suret edinerek hizmet ettikleri esnada nicelerinin ziyaretine gelir. Ancak bunların görüden ibaret olduğunu aklınızdan çıkarmayın. Zira hakiki ölüm, vaktiniz gelmeden kapınızı çalmayacak ve kemikli parmaklarıyla ruhunuzu nazikçe taşıyacak."
languages.original_text: "To many, He comes during their time of service, in images of blood and whispers from the shadows. But remember that those are mere visions. For true death will not come for you until your time, and it will take your soul gently in its bony hands."
